content: a very quick simple cowl that can be made to any size in any colour mix and uses up all those left over bits of sock yarn the woven look of the stitch pattern harmonises the different colours and the finished cowl is soft and drapey mine included bits of noro sock drops fable delight alpaca & baby alpaca silk rico superba poem & lang jawoll magic you could use just one colour or thick stripes or a single self patterning yarn let your imagination roll
